description: Mount Rainier is a designated National Register Historic District. This dataset shows historical sites within Mount Rainier designated by Prince George's County, as well as sites designated by the National Register of Historical Places.

metadata.description: Mount Rainier is a designated National Register Historic District. This dataset shows historical sites within Mount Rainier designated by Prince George's County, as well as sites designated by the National Register of Historical Places.

name: Mount Rainier: County Designated Historical Sites & National Register of Historic Places Sites
